div.p: The PHP development team would like to announce the immediate availability of PHP 5.3.10. This release delivers a critical security fix.

ul.li: Fixed arbitrary remote code execution vulnerability reported by Stefan Esser, CVE-2012-0830.

div.p: All users are strongly encouraged to upgrade to PHP 5.3.10.
For source downloads please visit our downloads page, Windows binaries can be found on windows.php.net/download/.
